item.title: My password confession: a.k.a sorting out password security with LastPass
item.description: I can’t plead ignorance: I should know better! For years I have preached to users about the importance of strong passwords, regular password changes and non-proliferation of the same password, yet I’ve fallen foul of 2 of my own rules. My password is strong - 13 characters, random alpha-numeric, upper and lower case and including special characters - but has been re-used in a few places, and hasnâ€™t been changed in a (long) while.
